Pork chops with pan sauce.directions: Season pork chops with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Dredge lightly in flour. Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Sear chops 4-5 minutes per side until golden and cooked through (145°F). Remove to plate. Add butter to pan, scrape up fond. Add broth and simmer 2 minutes. Stir in cream, simmer until thickened. Pour sauce over chops.

Beef and noodles.directions: Season beef with salt, pepper, garlic and onion powder. Brown in butter in Dutch oven. Add broth, bring to boil, reduce heat and simmer covered 2 hours until tender. Cook noodles according to package. Make slurry with 2 tbsp flour and cold water, stir into broth to thicken. Serve beef and gravy over noodles.

Smothered pork chops.directions: Season chops with salt, pepper, garlic and onion powder. Dredge in flour. Brown in butter 3-4 minutes per side. Remove. Add 2 tbsp flour to drippings, cook 1 minute. Whisk in broth, then cream. Return chops to pan, cover and simmer 30-40 minutes until tender. Serve with gravy.

Beef fried rice.directions: Slice beef thin, season with salt and pepper. Heat oil in wok over high heat. Stir-fry beef 2 minutes, remove. Scramble eggs, remove. Add more oil, stir-fry garlic 30 seconds. Add cold rice, break up clumps. Add soy sauce, toss. Return beef and eggs, add sesame oil. Toss to combine.

Chicken and rice casserole.directions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Mix rice, soup, broth, and garlic powder in 9x13 baking dish. Season chicken with salt and pepper, place on top. Dot with butter. Cover tightly with foil. Bake 1 hour. Remove foil, bake 15 more minutes until chicken is browned and rice is tender.

Korean-style beef bowls.directions: Brown beef. Add soy sauce, brown sugar, sesame oil, garlic, ginger. Cook 3 minutes. Serve over rice. Top with fried egg, sesame seeds, sriracha if desired.

Pork chop piccata.directions: Pound chops thin. Season, dredge in flour. Brown in butter and oil 3 minutes per side. Remove. Add broth, lemon juice, capers. Simmer 3 minutes. Swirl in cold butter. Return chops, spoon sauce over. Garnish with parsley.

Chicken marsala.directions: Pound chicken thin. Season with salt and pepper, dredge in flour. Brown in butter and oil 3-4 minutes per side. Remove. Sauté mushrooms and garlic. Add marsala, reduce by half. Add broth, simmer 5 minutes. Return chicken, simmer until sauce thickens.

City chicken.directions: Thread pork and veal on skewers to look like drumsticks. Dredge in flour, egg, breadcrumbs. Brown in oil. Braise covered 45 minutes until tender. A Depression-era classic.

Italian wedding soup.directions: Make tiny meatballs with meats, breadcrumbs, egg, parmesan, Italian seasoning. Drop into simmering broth. Add pasta, cook 8 minutes. Add spinach last 2 minutes. Drizzle in beaten eggs while stirring.

Sausage and rice casserole.directions: Brown sausage, crumble. Mix with rice, broth, and soup in baking dish. Cover. Bake at 350°F 45 minutes. Uncover, top with cheese. Bake 10 more minutes until cheese melts.

Chicken noodle soup.directions: Simmer chicken in broth with bay leaf, thyme, and garlic for 30 minutes. Remove chicken, shred. Add egg noodles to broth, cook according to package. Return shredded chicken. Season with salt and pepper. Remove bay leaf.

Sausage and peppers.directions: Brown sausages in oil. Remove, slice. Sauté peppers and garlic. Return sausage, add marinara and Italian seasoning. Simmer 20 minutes. Serve on hoagie rolls.

Breaded pork cutlets (schnitzel-style).directions: Pound pork very thin. Season with salt and pepper. Dredge in flour, egg, breadcrumbs. Pan-fry in oil until deep golden, 3-4 minutes per side. Serve with lemon wedges.

Sausage stroganoff.directions: Brown sliced sausage. Add flour, cook 1 minute. Add broth and Worcestershire, simmer 10 minutes. Cook noodles. Off heat, stir in sour cream. Serve over noodles.

Pork chop casserole.directions: Season pork chops, brown on both sides. Mix rice, soup, and broth in baking dish. Place chops on top. Cover. Bake at 350°F 1 hour until rice is tender and chops are cooked through.

Sausage and white bean soup.directions: Brown sausage, slice. Add garlic, cook 30 seconds. Add broth, beans, rosemary, parmesan rind. Simmer 30 minutes. Remove rind. Serve with crusty bread and drizzle of olive oil.

Breaded chicken parmesan.directions: Pound chicken thin. Dredge in flour, egg, breadcrumbs mixed with parmesan and Italian seasoning. Fry until golden. Top with marinara and mozzarella. Bake at 400°F 15 minutes until cheese bubbly.

Ground beef and rice soup.directions: Brown beef, drain. Add garlic, cook 30 seconds. Add broth, tomatoes, sauce, Italian seasoning. Bring to boil. Add rice, simmer covered 20 minutes until rice is tender. Season with salt and pepper.

Baked sausage and noodles.directions: Cook noodles. Brown crumbled sausage. Mix noodles, sausage, marinara, ricotta. Transfer to baking dish. Top with mozzarella. Bake at 375°F 25 minutes until bubbly.

Hunter's chicken.directions: Season chicken with salt and pepper. Sear in hot pan until golden. Wrap with bacon, top with BBQ sauce and cheese. Bake at 400°F for 25 minutes until chicken is cooked through and cheese is melted.

Chicken fried steak.directions: Pound steaks thin. Season flour with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Beat eggs with milk. Dredge steaks in flour, then egg wash, then flour again. Fry in 1/2 inch oil at 350°F for 4-5 minutes per side until deep golden. Drain on rack. Make gravy with pan drippings.

Chicken fried chicken.directions: Pound chicken thin. Marinate in buttermilk 2 hours. Season flour with salt, pepper, garlic powder, paprika. Mix buttermilk with egg. Dredge chicken in flour, buttermilk, flour again. Fry at 350°F 4-5 minutes per side until golden.

Loaded mashed potatoes.directions: Boil potatoes until tender. Mash with butter and milk. Stir in cheese and crumbled bacon. Season with salt and pepper. Serve with more cheese, bacon, and sour cream on top.

Potato soup.directions: Cook and crumble bacon. Sauté garlic in bacon fat. Make roux with butter and flour, add broth. Add cubed potatoes, simmer until tender. Add cream. Mash some potatoes for thickness. Serve with cheese, bacon, sour cream.

Fried potatoes and sausage skillet.directions: Dice potatoes small. Remove sausage from casing, crumble. Cook sausage until browned, remove. Add butter, fry potatoes until crispy golden. Season with garlic powder, paprika, salt, pepper. Return sausage, toss.

Buttered noodles.directions: Cook noodles according to package in salted water. Drain, reserving 1/2 cup pasta water. Return to pot, add butter and toss until melted. Add parmesan and toss, adding pasta water as needed for silky coating. Season with salt and pepper.

Potato and sausage casserole.directions: Slice potatoes thin. Remove sausage from casing, brown, crumble. Mix soup with milk. Layer: potatoes, sausage, soup mixture, cheese. Repeat. Bake covered at 350°F 1 hour. Uncover 15 minutes to brown.

Cheesy rice.directions: Cook rice in chicken broth. When done, stir in butter and shredded cheddar until melted and creamy. Season with salt.

Fried rice (plain or with meat).directions: Use cold day-old rice. Heat wok, scramble eggs, remove. Stir-fry protein until cooked, remove. Add oil, garlic, then rice. Break up clumps. Add soy sauce. Return eggs and protein. Drizzle sesame oil.

Pasta with meat sauce.directions: Brown beef with garlic. Add marinara and Italian seasoning. Simmer 20 minutes. Cook spaghetti. Toss with sauce. Serve with parmesan.

Scalloped potatoes with pork chops.directions: Season and brown pork chops. Slice potatoes thin. Make cream sauce with butter, flour, cream. Layer potatoes in dish with cheese and cream sauce. Top with pork chops. Cover, bake at 350°F 1 hour.

Potato pancakes.directions: Grate potatoes, squeeze out moisture. Mix with egg, flour, salt, pepper. Form patties. Fry in oil until crispy and golden, about 4-5 minutes per side. Serve with sour cream and applesauce.

Baked potato bar.directions: Bake potatoes at 400°F 1 hour. Split open, fluff with fork, season with salt and pepper. Set up toppings: butter, sour cream, cheese, bacon bits, chives. Let everyone build their own.

Pork chop and potato bake.directions: Season pork chops. Slice potatoes thin. Mix soup with milk. Layer in dish: potatoes, soup, cheese. Top with pork chops. Season chops with garlic powder. Cover. Bake at 350°F 1 hour. Uncover last 15 minutes.

Egg noodles with brown butter.directions: Cook egg noodles. Brown 6 tbsp butter until nutty and amber. Toss with noodles, parsley, parmesan. Season with salt and pepper.

Sausage gravy over rice.directions: Brown sausage, crumble. Add 3 tbsp flour, cook 1 minute. Slowly add 2.5 cups milk, stirring. Simmer until thickened. Season generously with pepper. Serve over cooked rice.

Fried chicken tenders.directions: Marinate tenders in buttermilk 2 hours. Season flour with salt, pepper, garlic powder, paprika. Dredge tenders in flour, then buttermilk/egg mix, then flour again. Fry at 350°F 5-6 minutes until golden and cooked through.

Ground beef and potato hash.directions: Dice potatoes small, fry in butter until crispy. Add ground beef, break up, cook through. Season with garlic powder, onion powder, salt, pepper. Press into pan, cook until bottom is crusty. Serve with fried eggs on top.

Chicken and dumplings (no veg).directions: Simmer chicken in broth 25 minutes until cooked. Remove and shred. Mix 2 cups flour, 1 tbsp baking powder, 1 tsp salt. Cut in 4 tbsp cold butter. Stir in 3/4 cup milk. Drop dumplings into simmering broth. Cover, cook 15 minutes. Return chicken.

Salisbury steak.directions: Mix beef with breadcrumbs, egg, salt, pepper. Form oval patties. Brown in butter. Remove. Sauté mushrooms. Add flour, cook 1 minute. Add broth and Worcestershire. Return patties. Simmer 15-20 minutes until cooked through.

Twice-baked potatoes.directions: Bake potatoes until tender. Halve, scoop out flesh. Mash with butter, sour cream, half the cheese, salt, pepper. Stuff back into skins. Top with remaining cheese and bacon. Bake at 375°F 15-20 minutes. Garnish with green onions.

Sausage and potato soup.directions: Remove sausage from casing, brown and crumble. Add garlic. Add cubed potatoes and broth. Simmer 20 minutes until potatoes are tender. Add cream. Season with salt and pepper.

Meatloaf.directions: Mix beef, pork, breadcrumbs, eggs, 1/4 cup ketchup, Worcestershire, and seasonings. Form into loaf on sheet pan. Mix remaining ketchup with brown sugar for glaze. Bake at 350°F for 45 minutes, add glaze, bake 15 more minutes until internal temp reaches 160°F. Rest 10 minutes.

Porcupine meatballs.directions: Mix beef with uncooked rice, salt, pepper, onion powder. Form into balls. Place in baking dish. Mix soup, broth, Worcestershire. Pour over meatballs. Cover. Bake at 350°F 1 hour until rice is tender.

Creamy chicken and rice.directions: Season and brown chicken. Remove. Add rice, soup, broth, garlic powder. Place chicken on top. Cover, simmer 25 minutes until rice is tender and chicken is cooked. Stir in sour cream. Season.

Potato skins.directions: Bake potatoes until tender. Halve, scoop out most of flesh (save for other use). Brush with butter, season with salt. Bake at 450°F 15 minutes until crispy. Fill with cheese and bacon. Bake until cheese melts. Serve with sour cream.

Spaghetti and meatballs.directions: Make meatballs: mix meats, soaked breadcrumbs, egg, parmesan, seasoning, garlic. Form balls, bake at 400°F for 20 minutes. Simmer in marinara 20 minutes. Cook spaghetti. Serve pasta topped with meatballs and sauce, extra parmesan.

French onion-style pork chops.directions: Caramelize onions. Brown pork chops. Top with onions and broth. Cover, simmer 20 minutes. Uncover, top with Gruyère. Broil until cheese bubbles and browns.

Hamburger helper style.directions: Brown beef. Add broth, milk, and pasta. Simmer covered 10-12 minutes until pasta is tender. Stir in cheese and tomato paste. Season with onion powder, garlic powder, salt. Stir until cheese melts.

Potato gnocchi.directions: Bake potatoes until tender. Rice while hot. Add flour, egg yolk, salt. Knead gently until dough forms. Roll into ropes, cut into pieces. Press with fork. Boil until they float. Serve with brown butter and sage.

Breaded fried sausage patties.directions: Form sausage into patties. Season flour. Dip in flour, beaten egg, breadcrumbs. Fry at 350°F until golden and cooked through, about 4 minutes per side.

Beef and rice stuffed potatoes.directions: Bake potatoes. Brown beef with taco seasoning. Cook rice. Halve potatoes, fluff centers. Top with butter, beef, rice, cheese. Broil to melt cheese. Add sour cream.

Hot beef sandwiches.directions: Slice roast beef thin. Make gravy: roux with butter and flour, add broth, simmer until thick. Heat beef in gravy. Place bread on plate, top with mashed potatoes, beef, and generous gravy.

Cracklin' chicken.directions: Flatten chicken butterfly style. Season heavily. Heat oil and butter in cast iron. Cook skin-side down with weight on top 30 minutes until skin is incredibly crispy. Flip 5 minutes.

Pork fried rice.directions: Use cold day-old rice. Stir-fry diced pork until cooked. Scramble eggs, set aside. Add rice, stir-fry on high heat. Add soy sauce, garlic, ginger. Return pork and eggs. Drizzle sesame oil. Top with green onions.

Beef tips and noodles.directions: Brown beef tips, remove. Sauté mushrooms. Add flour, cook 1 minute. Add broth and Worcestershire. Return beef. Simmer 30 minutes until tender. Stir in sour cream. Serve over egg noodles.

Sausage carbonara.directions: Cook spaghetti. Remove sausage from casing, brown and crumble. Beat eggs with cheeses and pepper. Toss hot pasta with sausage off heat. Quickly add egg mixture, toss with pasta water to create creamy sauce.

Duchess potatoes.directions: Make smooth mashed potatoes. Beat in yolks and butter. Season with nutmeg, salt, pepper. Pipe into decorative rosettes. Brush with egg. Bake at 400°F until golden.

Country fried pork chops.directions: Pound chops. Season flour. Dip in buttermilk-egg mixture, then flour. Fry at 350°F until golden and cooked through. Make white gravy with drippings.

Meatball subs.directions: Make meatballs: mix meats, breadcrumbs, parmesan, egg, garlic, Italian seasoning. Form balls, bake at 400°F 20 minutes. Simmer in marinara. Split rolls, fill with meatballs and sauce. Top with mozzarella. Broil until cheese melts.

Potato and sausage pierogi filling.directions: Boil potatoes until tender, mash with butter. Brown sausage with diced onion. Combine mashed potatoes with sausage mixture. Season with salt and pepper. Use as pierogi filling.

Chicken schnitzel.directions: Pound chicken very thin (1/4 inch). Season with salt and pepper. Dredge in flour, beaten egg, breadcrumbs. Fry in oil and butter mixture at medium-high heat 3 minutes per side until deep golden. Serve with lemon wedges.

Poor man's steak.directions: Mix ground beef with crushed crackers, egg, minced onion, salt and pepper. Form into oval patties. Brown in butter, then bake at 350°F for 30 minutes. Serve smothered in beef gravy.

Baked ziti with meat.directions: Preheat oven to 375°F. Cook ziti 2 minutes less than package directions. Brown beef, drain. Mix with marinara. Layer in 9x13: half pasta, half ricotta dollops, half meat sauce, half mozzarella. Repeat layers. Top with parmesan. Bake 25-30 minutes until bubbly. Broil 2 minutes to brown.

Cacio e pepe.directions: Cook spaghetti in salted water, reserve 2 cups pasta water. Toast cracked black pepper in dry pan. Add 1 cup pasta water, bring to simmer. Add drained pasta, toss. Remove from heat, add grated pecorino gradually, tossing vigorously while adding splashes of pasta water to create creamy emulsion.

Hasselback potatoes.directions: Place potato between two chopsticks. Slice thin crosswise, sticks prevent cutting through bottom. Brush with melted butter and oil. Season with salt, pepper, garlic. Bake at 425°F 45-50 minutes, basting occasionally. Top with parmesan, bake 5 more minutes.

Sausage and cheese stuffed potatoes.directions: Bake potatoes until tender. Halve, scoop out flesh. Mash with butter, sour cream, salt, pepper. Cook and crumble sausage. Mix sausage and cheese into potato mixture. Stuff back into skins. Bake at 375°F 15 minutes.

Rice pilaf.directions: Sauté rice in butter until slightly toasted. Add broth, salt, bay leaf. Bring to boil. Cover, simmer 18-20 minutes until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender. Fluff with fork, remove bay leaf.

Chicken and gravy over biscuits.directions: Cook and cube chicken. Make gravy: roux with butter and flour, add broth and cream, simmer until thick. Add thyme, chicken. Split biscuits, ladle chicken and gravy over.

Smash burgers.directions: Form beef into loose balls. On very hot griddle, smash thin with spatula. Season with salt and pepper. Cook 2 minutes until lacey edges form. Flip, add cheese, cook 1 minute. Toast buns. Stack with pickles and sauce.

Beef ragu over noodles.directions: Brown beef chunks. Add wine, reduce. Add tomatoes, broth, garlic, herbs. Braise covered at 300°F 3-4 hours until falling apart. Shred into sauce. Serve over egg noodles with parmesan.

Garlic butter steak bites.directions: Cut steak into 1-inch cubes. Season with salt and pepper. Sear in hot pan 2-3 minutes until browned. Add butter, garlic, soy sauce, honey. Toss and cook 1 more minute. Garnish with parsley.

Au gratin potatoes.directions: Slice potatoes thin. Layer in buttered dish with cheese, garlic, thyme, salt, pepper between layers. Pour cream over. Top with more cheese. Bake covered at 375°F 45 minutes. Uncover, bake 15 more until golden.

Swedish meatballs.directions: Mix meats with breadcrumbs, egg, allspice, nutmeg, salt. Form small balls. Brown in butter. Remove. Add flour to make roux. Add broth and cream. Simmer until thickened. Return meatballs to coat. Serve over egg noodles.

Chicken and rice soup.directions: Simmer chicken in broth with bay leaf and thyme until cooked. Remove and shred. Add rice to broth, cook until tender. Return chicken. Season with salt, pepper, lemon juice.

Sausage risotto.directions: Brown crumbled sausage. Toast rice with garlic. Add wine, stir until absorbed. Add warm broth ladle by ladle, stirring constantly. When creamy, fold in sausage, butter, and parmesan.

Deep fried potato wedges.directions: Cut potatoes into wedges. Soak in cold water 30 minutes. Dry well. Fry at 325°F until soft, then 375°F until golden and crispy. Season immediately with salt and spices.

Ground beef tacos (shell or over rice).directions: Brown beef, drain. Add taco seasoning and water per package. Simmer 5 minutes. Serve in taco shells or over rice with cheese, sour cream, and salsa.

Biscuits and sausage gravy.directions: Bake biscuits. Brown sausage, breaking into crumbles. Add 3 tbsp flour, cook 1 minute. Slowly whisk in 2.5 cups milk. Simmer until thick, 5-7 minutes. Season generously with pepper. Split biscuits, ladle gravy over.

Browned butter gnocchi.directions: Cook gnocchi until they float. Meanwhile, brown 6 tbsp butter until nutty and amber. Add sage leaves, fry until crispy. Toss gnocchi in brown butter. Season with salt, pepper. Top with parmesan.

Pork and rice bowls.directions: Brown pork. Add soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic, ginger. Cook 5 minutes. Serve over rice. Top with fried egg, drizzle sesame oil and sriracha.

Potato croquettes.directions: Make mashed potatoes with butter and parmesan. Season with nutmeg and salt. Cool. Shape into cylinders. Dip in flour, beaten egg, breadcrumbs. Deep fry at 350°F until golden. Drain on rack.

Chicken paprikash.directions: Brown chicken in butter 4 minutes per side. Add 2 tbsp paprika, stir 30 seconds. Add broth, simmer covered 30 minutes. Remove chicken. Make slurry with flour and water, stir in to thicken. Remove from heat, stir in sour cream. Return chicken.

Lazy pierogies.directions: Cook egg noodles, drain. Sauté onion in butter until caramelized. Mix noodles with mashed potatoes and cheese. Top with caramelized onions and sour cream.

Sausage and potato foil packs.directions: Slice sausage and cube potatoes. Toss with olive oil, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, pepper. Divide onto foil sheets. Seal packets. Grill or bake at 400°F 25-30 minutes. Open, top with parmesan.

Chicken bog.directions: Brown sausage, remove. Brown chicken 4 minutes per side. Add broth, bring to boil. Reduce heat, simmer 30 minutes. Remove chicken, shred. Add rice and sausage to broth. Cover, cook 20 minutes. Stir in chicken.

Beef and cheese quesadilla.directions: Brown beef with taco seasoning. Place cheese and beef on half of tortilla. Fold. Grill in butter until tortilla is crispy and cheese melts. Serve with sour cream and salsa.

Loco moco.directions: Make hamburger patty, season, cook to desired doneness. Make gravy: roux with butter and flour, add broth and soy sauce, simmer until thick. Fry egg with runny yolk. Stack: rice, patty, gravy, fried egg on top.

Potato and egg skillet.directions: Dice potatoes, fry in butter until crispy. Season with salt, pepper, paprika. Make wells, crack eggs into them. Cover, cook until eggs are set. Top with cheese if desired.

Cube steak with gravy.directions: Season flour with salt, pepper, garlic powder. Dredge steaks. Brown in oil and butter 4 minutes per side. Remove. Add 2 tbsp flour to drippings, cook 1 minute. Whisk in broth, simmer until thickened. Return steaks, simmer 10 minutes.

Pasta aglio e olio.directions: Cook spaghetti. Meanwhile, gently cook sliced garlic and red pepper flakes in generous olive oil until garlic is golden. Add pasta with some pasta water. Toss vigorously. Add parsley and parmesan.

Crispy rice with fried egg.directions: Press cold rice in hot buttered pan. Don't stir - let bottom get very crispy. Flip sections. Add soy sauce. Top with fried egg. Drizzle sesame oil, green onions.

Meatball soup.directions: Mix beef with cooked rice, egg, cumin, oregano, garlic, salt. Form small meatballs. Simmer broth with tomatoes and sauce. Drop meatballs in, simmer 20 minutes until meatballs are cooked through.

Potato au poivre.directions: Slice potatoes thin. Crush peppercorns coarsely. Layer potatoes in baking dish, season with crushed pepper and salt. Pour cream over. Bake at 375°F for 1 hour. Finish with cognac-butter sauce.

Butter chicken (simplified).directions: Cook chicken cubes in butter with garlic, ginger, spices. Add tomato sauce, simmer 15 minutes. Add cream, simmer until thickened. Serve over rice.

Hot hamburger plate.directions: Form ground beef into patties, season and cook to desired doneness. Place white bread on plate, top with patty, then mashed potatoes. Smother everything in hot beef gravy.

Sausage and egg fried rice.directions: Cook sausage until browned. Scramble eggs, set aside. Stir-fry cold rice with garlic. Add soy sauce. Return sausage and eggs. Drizzle sesame oil. Top with green onions.

Pork adobo.directions: Combine pork with soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, peppercorns and 1/2 cup water. Simmer covered 30 minutes. Remove pork, reduce sauce. Pan-fry pork until crispy. Serve with reduced sauce and rice.

Cheesy potato soup.directions: Cook bacon, crumble. Make roux, add broth. Add cubed potatoes, simmer until tender. Add cream and most of the cheese. Blend partially for thickness. Serve with sour cream, bacon, cheese.

Chicken bog casserole.directions: Brown sausage, set aside. Brown chicken. Add broth, simmer until chicken is cooked. Remove and shred. Add rice and sausage to broth. Cover, cook 20 minutes. Stir in chicken.

Ground pork dan dan noodles.directions: Brown ground pork with garlic and ginger. Make sauce with sesame paste, soy sauce, chili oil, and ground Sichuan peppercorns. Cook noodles, toss with sauce, top with pork and scallions.

Potato fondant.directions: Cut potatoes into thick cylinders. Sear in butter until golden on both sides. Add stock, garlic, and thyme. Bake at 425°F for 30 minutes, basting occasionally until glazed and tender.

Lasagna.directions: Cook noodles. Brown beef, add marinara. Mix ricotta with egg and Italian seasoning. Layer in 9x13: sauce, noodles, ricotta, meat sauce, mozzarella. Repeat 3 times, end with sauce and mozzarella. Top with parmesan. Bake at 375°F covered 45 minutes, uncovered 15 minutes.

White lasagna.directions: Make béchamel: roux with butter and flour, add cream, garlic, nutmeg. Cook and cube chicken. Layer: sauce, noodles, ricotta, chicken, mozzarella. Repeat. Top with parmesan. Bake at 375°F 45 minutes.

Baked spaghetti.directions: Cook spaghetti. Brown beef, add marinara. Mix cream cheese with sour cream. Layer in dish: spaghetti, cream mixture, meat sauce, mozzarella. Top with parmesan. Bake at 350°F 30 minutes.

Fettuccine alfredo.directions: Cook fettuccine. Melt butter, sauté garlic 30 seconds. Add cream, simmer 5 minutes. Stir in parmesan until melted and smooth. Season with salt and pepper. Toss with pasta, adding pasta water as needed for silky consistency.

Chicken alfredo.directions: Season chicken with salt and pepper. Cook in butter until done, 6-7 minutes per side. Rest and slice. Sauté garlic in same pan 30 seconds. Add cream, simmer 5 minutes. Stir in parmesan until melted. Cook fettuccine, toss with sauce and chicken.

Sausage alfredo.directions: Remove sausage from casing, brown and crumble. Add garlic, cook 30 seconds. Add cream, simmer 5 minutes. Stir in parmesan until melted. Cook fettuccine. Toss with sauce.

Pasta primavera (no veg, just butter her.directions: Cook pasta al dente. Melt butter with minced garlic and fresh herbs (basil, parsley). Toss hot pasta with butter sauce and parmesan. Season with salt and pepper.

Rigatoni with meat sauce.directions: Cook rigatoni. Brown beef with garlic. Add marinara and Italian seasoning, simmer 20 minutes. Toss with pasta. Serve with parmesan.

Vodka sauce pasta.directions: Sauté garlic and red pepper flakes in butter. Add tomato paste, cook 2 minutes. Add vodka, simmer 3 minutes. Add cream, simmer 5 minutes. Toss with pasta and parmesan. Garnish with basil.

Sausage vodka rigatoni.directions: Brown crumbled sausage. Add garlic and red pepper flakes. Add tomato paste, cook 2 minutes. Add vodka, simmer 3 minutes. Add cream, simmer 5 minutes. Toss with pasta and parmesan.

Bolognese.directions: Brown beef and pork in butter in Dutch oven, breaking into fine crumbles. Add tomato paste, cook 2 minutes. Add crushed tomatoes, broth, and Italian seasoning. Simmer uncovered 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Stir in milk, simmer 30 more minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

Lasagna soup.directions: Brown beef and sausage. Add garlic, Italian seasoning. Add crushed tomatoes and broth. Simmer 20 minutes. Add broken lasagna noodles, cook 10 minutes. Serve topped with dollops of ricotta and shredded mozzarella.

Baked penne.directions: Cook penne. Mix ricotta with egg and Italian seasoning. Layer in dish: pasta, ricotta mixture, marinara, mozzarella. Repeat. Top with parmesan. Bake at 375°F 25-30 minutes.

Manicotti.directions: Cook manicotti until pliable. Mix ricotta, half mozzarella, parmesan, egg, garlic, Italian seasoning, salt. Pipe filling into shells. Spread marinara in baking dish, arrange shells, top with more sauce and remaining mozzarella. Bake covered at 375°F 30 minutes, uncovered 10 minutes.

Stuffed shells.directions: Cook shells 2 minutes less than package. Mix ricotta, half mozzarella, parmesan, egg, Italian seasoning, salt. Spread thin layer marinara in 9x13 dish. Stuff shells, arrange in dish. Top with remaining marinara and mozzarella. Bake covered at 375°F 25 minutes, uncovered 10 minutes.

Pastitsio.directions: Cook pasta. Brown beef with cinnamon. Make béchamel with butter, flour, milk, nutmeg, egg yolks. Layer: pasta, meat, more pasta, béchamel. Top with parmesan. Bake at 350°F 45 minutes until golden.

Pasta e fagioli (skip beans or sub potat.directions: Brown beef. Add garlic and Italian seasoning. Add cubed potatoes, tomatoes, broth. Simmer 20 minutes until potatoes are tender. Add pasta, cook 10 more minutes. Serve with parmesan.

Spaghetti aglio e olio with sausage.directions: Cook spaghetti. Brown crumbled sausage. Sauté sliced garlic in olive oil until golden. Add pepper flakes. Toss pasta with oil, sausage, and parsley. Top with parmesan.

Chicken parm over spaghetti.directions: Pound chicken thin. Bread with flour, egg, breadcrumbs mixed with parmesan. Fry until golden. Place in baking dish, top with marinara and mozzarella. Bake at 400°F 15 minutes. Cook spaghetti, toss with remaining marinara. Serve chicken over pasta.

Lazy lasagna.directions: Cook rigatoni. Brown beef, add marinara and Italian seasoning. Mix pasta with ricotta. Layer in dish: pasta-ricotta mixture, meat sauce, mozzarella. Repeat. Top with parmesan. Bake at 375°F 20 minutes.

Pappardelle with pork ragu.directions: Brown cubed pork. Add wine, reduce. Add tomatoes, broth, garlic, rosemary. Simmer covered 3 hours until pork shreds easily. Cook pappardelle. Toss with ragu and parmesan.

Mostaccioli.directions: Cook pasta. Remove sausage from casing, brown. Add marinara. Layer in dish: pasta, ricotta, meat sauce, mozzarella. Repeat. Top with parmesan. Bake at 375°F 25 minutes.

Cincinnati chili.directions: Brown beef, drain. Add tomato sauce, broth, and all spices. Simmer 2 hours uncovered until thick. Cook spaghetti. Serve '3-way': spaghetti, chili, shredded cheddar. Add beans for 4-way, onions for 5-way (if using).

Sausage and ricotta baked pasta.directions: Cook pasta. Brown sausage. Layer: pasta, ricotta dollops, sausage, marinara, mozzarella. Repeat. Top with parmesan. Bake at 375°F 25 minutes until bubbly.

Creamy chicken pasta bake.directions: Cook pasta. Cook seasoned chicken, dice. Mix soup, sour cream, garlic, Italian seasoning. Combine with pasta, chicken, half the cheese. Transfer to baking dish. Top with remaining cheese. Bake at 375°F 25 minutes until bubbly.

Pasta with butter and egg.directions: Cook spaghetti. Beat eggs with parmesan, salt, generous pepper. Toss hot pasta with butter. Off heat, add egg mixture, toss vigorously, adding pasta water to create creamy sauce.

Spaghetti pie.directions: Cook spaghetti, toss with eggs, butter, parmesan. Press into pie plate to form crust. Spread ricotta. Top with browned beef and marinara, then mozzarella. Bake at 350°F 30 minutes until set.

Tetrazzini.directions: Cook pasta and chicken. Sauté mushrooms. Mix with soup, cream, sherry, half the parmesan. Toss with pasta and diced chicken. Pour into dish. Top with breadcrumbs and remaining parmesan. Bake at 350°F 25 minutes.

American goulash.directions: Brown beef with garlic. Add tomatoes, sauce, broth, Worcestershire, Italian seasoning. Add uncooked macaroni. Cover, simmer 15-20 minutes until pasta is tender.

Cajun chicken pasta.directions: Season chicken with Cajun spices. Cook in butter, slice. Sauté garlic and sun-dried tomatoes. Add cream, parmesan. Toss with cooked penne and chicken.

Orecchiette with sausage.directions: Remove sausage from casing, brown and crumble. Add garlic and red pepper flakes. Add broth, simmer 10 minutes. Cook pasta, add to sauce with some pasta water. Toss with parmesan and olive oil.

Rotini with meat sauce.directions: Brown ground beef with onion and garlic. Add tomato sauce and Italian seasoning, simmer 20 minutes. Cook rotini, drain and toss with meat sauce. Top with parmesan.

Cheesy beef pasta skillet.directions: Brown beef with garlic. Add tomatoes, broth, Italian seasoning, uncooked pasta. Cover, simmer 15 minutes. Stir in cream cheese and cheddar until melted and creamy.

Creamy sausage rigatoni.directions: Remove sausage from casing, brown and crumble. Add garlic, cook 30 seconds. Add marinara and cream, simmer 10 minutes. Cook rigatoni, add to sauce with parmesan. Toss until coated.

Pasta with brown butter and sage.directions: Cook pasta. Brown 6 tbsp butter until nutty and amber. Add sage leaves, fry until crispy. Toss with pasta and pasta water. Season with salt and pepper. Top with parmesan.

Cavatappi with vodka sauce.directions: Sauté garlic and red pepper flakes in butter. Add tomato paste, cook 2 minutes. Add vodka, simmer 3 minutes. Add cream, simmer 5 minutes. Toss with pasta and parmesan. Top with basil.

Beefaroni from scratch.directions: Brown beef with garlic. Add tomatoes, sauce, broth, Italian seasoning, sugar. Add macaroni. Cover, simmer 15-20 minutes until pasta is tender and sauce thickens.

Linguine with clam sauce... no clams.directions: Cook linguine. Sauté garlic in butter and oil 30 seconds. Add wine and clam juice, simmer 5 minutes. Add canned clam meat and red pepper flakes. Toss with pasta and parsley. Season with salt.

Chicken noodle casserole.directions: Cook and cube chicken. Cook noodles. Mix chicken, noodles, soup, sour cream, half the cheese. Transfer to baking dish. Top with remaining cheese and buttered breadcrumbs. Bake at 350°F 30 minutes.

Broken lasagna noodles in broth.directions: Break lasagna noodles into pieces. Brown crumbled sausage with garlic. Add broth and Italian seasoning. Add noodles, simmer until tender, about 12 minutes. Serve with parmesan.

Penne alla buttera.directions: Remove sausage from casing, brown. Add garlic, cook 30 seconds. Add cream, simmer until reduced slightly. Cook penne. Toss with sauce and parmesan. Season with pepper.

Mac and cheese with meat.directions: Cook macaroni. Brown beef, drain, season. Make cheese sauce: roux with butter and flour, add milk, stir in cheeses. Combine pasta, beef, and cheese sauce. For baked: top with breadcrumbs, bake at 375°F 20 minutes.

Million dollar spaghetti.directions: Cook spaghetti. Brown beef, add marinara and Italian seasoning. Mix cream cheese, sour cream, cottage cheese. Layer in 9x13: spaghetti, cheese mixture, meat sauce, mozzarella. Bake at 350°F 30 minutes.

Marry me chicken pasta.directions: Season chicken, brown in butter 6 minutes per side. Remove, slice. Sauté garlic, add broth, cream, sun-dried tomatoes, Italian seasoning. Simmer 10 minutes. Add parmesan. Cook pasta, add to sauce with chicken.

Sausage and pepper pasta (no peppers).directions: Remove sausage from casing, brown and crumble. Add garlic and Italian seasoning. Add marinara, simmer 15 minutes. Cook pasta. Toss with sauce and parmesan.

Shells and cheese with ground beef.directions: Cook shells. Brown beef with garlic powder, salt, pepper. Cube Velveeta, melt with milk over low heat. Combine pasta, beef, and cheese sauce.

Tuscan chicken pasta.directions: Season and cook chicken, slice. Sauté garlic and sun-dried tomatoes. Add cream and Italian seasoning, simmer. Add spinach to wilt. Add parmesan. Cook pasta. Toss with sauce and chicken.

Angel hair with butter and garlic.directions: Cook pasta. Melt butter with sliced garlic until garlic is golden. Toss with pasta, parmesan, parsley, salt, and pepper.

Beef stroganoff with penne.directions: Cook penne according to package. Slice beef into strips. Season with salt and pepper. Brown in butter over high heat, remove. Sauté garlic 30 seconds. Add 2 tbsp flour, cook 1 minute. Whisk in broth and Worcestershire. Simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat, stir in sour cream. Return beef, toss with pasta.

Pork ragu pappardelle.directions: Brown pork chunks in oil. Add onion, garlic, tomato paste, wine, and rosemary. Braise at 325°F for 3 hours until falling apart. Shred pork, toss with cooked pappardelle. Top with parmesan.

Creamy pesto pasta (if you have pesto or.directions: Cook pasta. Warm cream with pesto, stir in parmesan. Toss with pasta. Top with toasted pine nuts. If no pesto: blend basil, garlic, parmesan, pine nuts, olive oil.

Spaghetti with fried eggs.directions: Cook spaghetti. Toss with garlic, butter, red pepper flakes. Divide onto plates. Fry eggs in olive oil until whites are set but yolks runny. Top each serving with fried egg and parmesan. Break yolk to coat pasta.

Garlic butter spaghetti with chicken.directions: Cook spaghetti. Season chicken, cook in olive oil 6-7 minutes per side. Rest, slice. Melt butter with minced garlic 1 minute. Toss pasta with garlic butter, parmesan, parsley. Top with sliced chicken.

Cheesy baked rotini.directions: Cook rotini. Mix with soup, milk, half the cheeses. Transfer to baking dish. Top with remaining cheese. Bake at 375°F 25 minutes until bubbly and golden.

Chicken spaghetti.directions: Cook chicken in broth, shred. Cook spaghetti. Combine soup, Rotel, and cubed Velveeta in pot, heat until cheese melts. Add chicken and pasta, stir. Transfer to 9x13 dish. Bake at 350°F 25 minutes until bubbly.

Dump and bake meatball pasta.directions: Combine uncooked pasta, meatballs, sauce, broth, Italian seasoning in baking dish. Cover. Bake at 400°F 40 minutes. Uncover, add cheese. Bake 10 more minutes.

Hungarian noodles.directions: Cook and crumble bacon. Cook noodles. Mix hot noodles with sour cream, cottage cheese, and butter. Season with paprika, salt, pepper. Top with bacon crumbles.

Beef and noodle bake.directions: Brown beef with garlic. Cook noodles. Mix beef, noodles, soup, sour cream. Transfer to baking dish. Top with cheese. Bake at 350°F 25 minutes until bubbly.

Sausage and ricotta stuffed shells.directions: Cook shells. Mix ricotta, egg, half mozzarella, Italian seasoning. Fold in cooked crumbled sausage. Stuff shells. Place in dish with marinara. Top with remaining mozzarella. Bake at 375°F 30 minutes.

Creamy garlic chicken pasta.directions: Season chicken with Italian seasoning, salt, pepper. Cook in butter 6-7 minutes per side. Remove, slice. Sauté garlic 30 seconds. Add cream, simmer 5 minutes. Add parmesan. Cook pasta, toss with sauce and chicken.

Johnny Marzetti.directions: Brown beef with onion and garlic. Add tomato sauce and Worcestershire, simmer 15 minutes. Cook macaroni, combine with meat sauce. Top with cheese and bake at 350°F for 25 minutes until bubbly.

Linguine carbonara.directions: Cook linguine. Fry bacon until crispy. Whisk eggs with grated cheeses. Toss hot pasta with bacon, remove from heat, add egg mixture and toss quickly. Season generously with black pepper.

Ground beef stroganoff noodles.directions: Brown beef with garlic. Add flour, cook 1 minute. Add broth and Worcestershire, simmer 10 minutes. Cook noodles. Remove from heat, stir in sour cream. Toss with noodles. Season.

Three cheese baked ziti.directions: Cook ziti. Mix ricotta with egg, half mozzarella, Italian seasoning. Layer in dish: pasta, ricotta mixture, marinara, mozzarella. Repeat. Top with parmesan. Bake at 375°F 30 minutes.

Cheeseburger pasta.directions: Cook macaroni according to package. Brown beef with garlic powder, salt and pepper. Add milk, bring to simmer. Stir in cheeses until melted. Add ketchup and mustard. Fold in macaroni. Simmer until thick and creamy.

Spicy sausage pasta.directions: Brown crumbled sausage. Add garlic and red pepper flakes. Add tomatoes, simmer 15 minutes. Add cream. Cook pasta, toss with sauce and parmesan. Top with fresh basil.

Ravioli bake.directions: Brown sausage. Layer frozen ravioli, sauce, sausage, and dollops of ricotta in baking dish. Top with mozzarella and parmesan. Bake covered at 375°F for 45 minutes, uncover last 10 minutes.

Hamburger gravy over noodles.directions: Brown beef, drain, set aside. Make roux with butter and flour. Add broth, simmer until thickened. Return beef, season with salt, pepper, garlic powder. Cook noodles, serve gravy over top.

One pot chicken and pasta.directions: Brown diced chicken with garlic and Italian seasoning. Add broth and pasta. Cover, cook 12-15 minutes until pasta is tender. Stir in cream and parmesan. Season. Let thicken 2 minutes.

Biscuits and gravy.directions: Brown sausage in skillet, breaking into crumbles. Add 3 tbsp flour, stir 1 minute. Slowly whisk in 2.5 cups milk. Simmer until thickened, 5-7 minutes. Season generously with pepper and salt. Split warm biscuits, ladle gravy over top.

Pancakes and sausage.directions: Cook sausage links until browned and cooked through. Make pancakes: mix dry, mix wet, combine, griddle. Stack pancakes, serve with sausage links and maple syrup.

French toast.directions: Whisk 4 eggs, 1 cup milk, 1 tsp vanilla, 1/2 tsp cinnamon, 1 tbsp sugar. Dip thick bread slices in mixture. Cook in buttered pan over medium heat 3-4 minutes per side until golden. Serve with butter and maple syrup.

Eggs benedict.directions: Make hollandaise: whisk 3 yolks with 1 tbsp lemon juice over double boiler until thick. Slowly drizzle in 1/2 cup melted butter, whisking constantly. Season with salt and cayenne. Toast muffins, warm Canadian bacon. Poach eggs in simmering water with vinegar 3 minutes. Assemble and top with hollandaise.

Fried egg sandwich.directions: Fry eggs in butter to desired doneness, season with salt and pepper. Toast bread with butter. Layer egg and cheese between toast. Press slightly so yolk breaks (if desired).

Breakfast burrito.directions: Dice and fry potatoes until crispy. Cook crumbled sausage. Scramble eggs in butter. Warm tortillas. Layer eggs, sausage, potatoes, cheese in tortilla. Fold ends in, roll tight.

Hash browns and eggs.directions: Shred potatoes, rinse, squeeze dry. Season with salt and pepper. Fry in butter in cast iron over medium heat, pressing flat. Cook 7-8 minutes per side until crispy. Fry eggs in butter. Serve eggs over hash browns.

Shakshuka (no tomato chunks).directions: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil. Add tomato puree, cumin, paprika, cayenne, and salt. Simmer until thickened. Make wells and crack in eggs. Cover and cook until whites are set.

Quiche.directions: Prebake crust 10 minutes. Whisk 4 eggs with 1.5 cups cream, salt, pepper, nutmeg. Layer cooked bacon and cheese in crust. Pour in egg mixture. Bake at 350°F 40-45 minutes until set and golden.

Frittata.directions: Beat 8 eggs with milk, salt, pepper. Cook diced potatoes and crumbled sausage in oven-safe skillet. Pour in eggs. Cook on stovetop until edges set. Transfer to 375°F oven 10-12 minutes until set. Top with parmesan.

Grilled cheese.directions: Butter outside of bread slices. Layer cheese between bread, buttered sides out. Cook in skillet over medium-low heat 3-4 minutes per side until golden brown and cheese is melted.

Tuna melt.directions: Mix drained tuna with mayo, salt, pepper. Toast bread with butter. Top with tuna salad and cheese slices. Broil until cheese melts and bubbles.

Patty melt.directions: Form thin beef patty. Cook to desired doneness. Caramelize onions low and slow. Butter bread. Layer: rye, cheese, patty, onions, cheese, rye. Grill until bread is golden and cheese melts.

Sloppy joes.directions: Brown beef, drain. Add ketchup, brown sugar, Worcestershire, mustard, garlic powder. Simmer 15 minutes until thickened. Season. Serve on toasted buns.

French dip.directions: Season roast with salt, sear all sides. Add broth, Worcestershire, garlic, thyme. Cover, braise at 300°F 3-4 hours until very tender. Shred beef. Toast buttered French bread with provolone. Fill with beef. Serve with strained jus for dipping.

Philly cheesesteak.directions: Freeze steak 30 minutes for easier slicing. Slice paper thin. Season with salt and pepper. Cook quickly on hot griddle. Pile meat, top with provolone. Cover to melt cheese. Scoop into buttered toasted hoagie roll.

Pulled pork sandwiches.directions: Rub pork with spices. Slow cook 8-10 hours until falling apart. Shred, mix with BBQ sauce. Pile onto brioche buns. Top with pickles.

Hot dogs.directions: Grill, boil, or pan-fry hot dogs until heated through and slightly charred. Toast buns if desired. Place hot dog in bun. Top with desired condiments.

Corn dogs.directions: Mix cornmeal, flour, baking powder, sugar, salt. Add egg and milk to form thick batter. Insert sticks into hot dogs. Coat in batter. Deep fry at 365°F 3-4 minutes until golden brown.

Pigs in a blanket.directions: Wrap each sausage in triangle of crescent dough. Bake at 375°F 12-15 minutes until golden. Serve with mustard for dipping.

Empanadas.directions: Cook beef with cumin and paprika. Add chopped olives, diced egg, raisins. Roll dough into circles. Add filling to half, fold, crimp edges with fork. Brush with egg wash. Bake at 400°F 20-25 minutes until golden. Or deep fry.

Pierogies from scratch.directions: Make dough: flour, egg, sour cream, salt. Rest 30 minutes. Make filling: mashed potatoes with cheese. Roll dough thin, cut circles. Add filling, fold and seal edges. Boil until they float. Pan-fry in butter until golden. Serve with bacon.

Pot pie (no veg).directions: Poach and shred chicken. Make roux with butter and flour, add broth and cream. Season with thyme, salt, pepper. Add chicken. Pour into pie dish, top with crust. Bake at 400°F for 35 minutes until golden.

Chicken pot pie soup.directions: Cook and cube chicken. Make roux, add broth, cook potatoes until tender. Add cream, chicken, peas, thyme. Bake pie crust cut into crackers. Serve soup topped with pie crust crackers.

Beef pot pie.directions: Simmer beef in broth with thyme until tender. Make roux with butter and flour, add broth to thicken. Add potatoes, peas, Worcestershire. Pour into pie dish. Top with crust. Bake at 400°F 35-40 minutes.

Shepherd's pie.directions: Make mashed potatoes. Brown lamb. Add tomato paste, broth, Worcestershire, peas. Simmer 15 minutes. Pour into baking dish. Top with mashed potatoes. Bake at 400°F 25 minutes. Broil to brown top.

Cottage pie.directions: Make mashed potatoes with butter and milk. Brown beef with garlic. Add broth, tomato paste, Worcestershire. Simmer 15 minutes until thickened. Transfer to baking dish. Top with mashed potatoes. Bake at 400°F 25 minutes. Broil to brown top.

Tamale pie.directions: Brown beef with cumin and chili powder. Add enchilada sauce and corn. Pour into baking dish. Make cornbread topping with cornmeal, milk, butter. Spread over filling. Top with cheese. Bake at 375°F 30 minutes.

Frito pie.directions: Brown beef, add chili powder, cumin, tomatoes. Simmer 15 minutes. Layer Fritos in dish, top with chili, then cheese. Bake at 375°F until cheese melts. Top with sour cream.

Chili (no beans).directions: Brown beef, drain. Add garlic, cook 1 minute. Add all spices, stir 30 seconds. Add tomatoes and sauce. Simmer 45 minutes to 1 hour until thick. Season with salt and pepper.

White chicken chili (no beans).directions: Cook and shred chicken. Sauté garlic. Add broth, cumin, oregano, cayenne. Add cream cheese, stir until melted. Add chicken, simmer 20 minutes. Serve with sour cream and cheese.

Pozole (no hominy sub potato).directions: Simmer pork in broth until tender. Toast and rehydrate chiles, blend with garlic. Shred pork, add chile sauce and cubed potatoes. Simmer until potatoes are tender. Serve with oregano, lime, radishes.

Menudo (simplified).directions: Clean tripe thoroughly. Simmer with bay leaf and salt for 2-3 hours until tender. Make chile sauce: toast and rehydrate guajillos, blend with garlic. Add chile sauce and hominy to tripe. Simmer 30 minutes. Serve with lime, oregano, tortillas.

Bone broth.directions: Roast bones at 400°F 45 minutes. Transfer to large pot with vinegar, bay leaves, peppercorns. Cover with water. Simmer 12-24 hours, skimming occasionally. Strain, season with salt. Store in jars.

Egg drop soup.directions: Heat broth with ginger, soy sauce. Make slurry with cornstarch and water, add to broth to thicken slightly. Beat eggs. While stirring broth in circles, slowly drizzle in eggs. They'll form ribbons. Remove from heat. Add sesame oil, garnish with green onions.

Wonton soup (no filling veg).directions: Mix pork with soy sauce, sesame oil, ginger, salt, and pepper. Fill wonton wrappers, seal edges. Simmer in chicken broth until wontons float. Garnish with scallions.

Egg salad sandwich.directions: Hard boil eggs, cool, chop. Mix with mayo, Dijon, chives, salt, pepper. Serve on bread. Simple and satisfying.

Pancakes.directions: Whisk flour, baking powder, sugar, salt. Mix milk, egg, melted butter, vanilla. Combine wet and dry, don't overmix. Ladle onto buttered griddle at 375°F. Flip when bubbles form. Cook until golden.

Waffles.directions: Separate eggs. Mix flour, baking powder, sugar, salt. Add yolks, milk, melted butter, vanilla. Beat whites to stiff peaks, fold in. Cook in preheated waffle iron until golden and crispy.

Biscuits and honey.directions: Cut cold butter into flour mixed with baking powder and salt. Add buttermilk, mix until just combined. Pat out, cut rounds. Bake at 425°F 12-15 minutes. Serve warm with butter and honey.

Shakshuka (no tomato version).directions: Blend roasted peppers with garlic, cumin, paprika. Simmer in skillet until slightly thickened. Make wells, crack in eggs. Top with feta. Cover and cook until eggs are set.

Omelette.directions: Beat 3 eggs with salt and pepper. Melt butter in nonstick pan over medium heat. Add eggs, let set slightly, gently stir while tilting pan. When almost set but still moist, add cheese and ham to one half. Fold over.

Breakfast casserole.directions: Brown sausage, crumble. Beat eggs with milk, salt, pepper. Layer cubed bread, sausage, and cheese in greased dish. Pour egg mixture over. Refrigerate overnight. Bake at 350°F 45 minutes until set.

Strata.directions: Layer bread cubes, cooked bacon, onion, and cheese in buttered dish. Whisk eggs with milk, salt, pepper. Pour over layers. Refrigerate overnight. Bake at 350°F for 45 minutes until puffed and golden.

Huevos rancheros (simplified).directions: Warm salsa. Lightly fry tortillas in oil to soften. Heat refried beans. Fry eggs sunny-side up. Stack: tortilla, beans, fried egg, warm salsa, crumbled queso fresco.

Corned beef hash.directions: Dice potatoes small, parboil 5 minutes. Dice corned beef. Fry potatoes in butter until crispy. Add corned beef, season with pepper and garlic powder. Press into patty shape, cook without stirring until bottom is crispy. Serve with fried eggs on top.

Spam and eggs.directions: Slice Spam, pan-fry until crispy and caramelized on both sides. Fry eggs in butter to desired doneness. Serve Spam and eggs with rice.

Beans and rice.directions: Sauté garlic in oil. Add rice, toast 1 minute. Add broth, cumin, salt. Cook covered 18 minutes. Fluff. Stir in warmed beans. Squeeze lime over top.

Red beans and rice.directions: Soak beans overnight. Simmer with ham hock, bay leaf, thyme for 2 hours. Add sliced sausage and Cajun seasoning. Cook 1 more hour, mashing some beans to thicken. Serve over rice.

Black beans and rice.directions: Cook rice in broth. Sauté garlic in oil. Add beans, cumin, oregano, bay leaf. Simmer 15 minutes. Serve beans over rice. Squeeze lime on top.

Refried beans.directions: Cook beans until very tender. Reserve cooking liquid. Mash beans. Heat lard in skillet. Add garlic and cumin. Add mashed beans, cooking liquid as needed. Stir and mash until creamy. Season with salt.

Bean and cheese burrito.directions: Warm tortilla. Spread refried beans down center. Add shredded cheese. Roll burrito style, folding in ends. Optional: grill seam-side down for crispy exterior. Serve with sour cream and salsa.

Quesadilla.directions: Melt butter on griddle. Place tortilla, add shredded cheese to half. Fold over. Cook until bottom is golden, flip, cook other side. Cheese should be melted. Serve with sour cream and salsa.

Nachos.directions: Brown beef, add taco seasoning. Layer chips on sheet pan, top with beef and shredded cheese. Bake at 400°F until cheese melts. Top with jalapeños, sour cream, salsa.

Chili.directions: Brown beef, drain. Add garlic, cook 1 minute. Add chili powder, cumin, paprika, cook 30 seconds. Add tomatoes, sauce, beans. Simmer 30-45 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Serve with cheese and sour cream.

Chili mac.directions: Brown beef with garlic. Add chili powder and cumin. Add tomatoes, sauce. Simmer 15 minutes. Cook macaroni, drain. Add to chili. Stir in half the cheese. Top with remaining cheese, cover until melted.

Tuna casserole.directions: Cook noodles. Mix with drained tuna, soup, milk, peas, half the cheese. Transfer to baking dish. Top with remaining cheese and buttered breadcrumbs. Bake at 350°F 25-30 minutes until bubbly.

Chicken salad sandwich.directions: Poach or roast chicken, cool, and dice. Mix with mayonnaise, Dijon, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Serve on bread or croissants.

BLT without the L and T.directions: Cook bacon until crispy. Toast bread with butter. Spread mayo generously on both slices. Stack bacon between bread. Cut diagonally.

Club sandwich.directions: Toast 3 slices of bread. Spread mayo on all. Layer turkey and bacon on first slice, top with second slice. Add lettuce, tomato, salt, pepper, more turkey if desired. Top with third slice. Secure with toothpicks, cut diagonally.

Reuben.directions: Drain sauerkraut well. Spread thousand island on rye bread. Layer corned beef, sauerkraut, Swiss cheese. Top with another slice of bread. Butter outsides. Grill until bread is golden and cheese melts.

Philly cheesesteak (no peppers/onions).directions: Freeze steak 30 minutes, slice paper thin. Season. Cook on hot griddle, chopping as it cooks. Pile meat, drizzle with warm Cheez Whiz. Scoop into buttered toasted roll.

Pulled pork sandwich.directions: Coat pork with BBQ rub. Slow cook or smoke at 225°F until internal temp 200°F and fork tender. Rest, then shred with forks. Toss with vinegar and BBQ sauce. Pile on buns with coleslaw.

Pork carnitas.directions: Cut pork into chunks. Season with salt, cumin, oregano, garlic. Simmer covered in orange juice, lime juice, and lard for 3 hours. Uncover, increase heat, let liquid evaporate and pork crisp. Shred and serve.

Birria tacos.directions: Make birria: braise beef in chile sauce until tender, shred. Dip tortilla in red consommé. Griddle with cheese. Add birria. Fold. Serve with consommé for dipping, topped with cilantro and onion.

Cheese enchiladas.directions: Soften tortillas in warm oil. Fill with mixed cheeses, roll. Place seam-down in sauce-covered dish. Top with more sauce and cheese. Bake at 375°F 20 minutes. Serve with sour cream.

Beef enchiladas.directions: Brown beef with cumin, chili powder, garlic. Dip tortillas in warm sauce. Fill with beef and cheese, roll. Place seam-down in sauce-covered dish. Top with more sauce and cheese. Bake at 375°F 20 minutes.

Tamales.directions: Soak husks. Whip lard until fluffy. Add masa mixed with broth, baking powder, salt. Beat until light. Spread masa on husk, add filling of shredded chicken and salsa. Fold. Steam 1.5 hours until masa pulls away from husk.

Chicken pot pie (no veg).directions: Cook and cube chicken. Cook cubed potatoes in broth until tender. Make roux with butter and flour, add broth, simmer until thick. Add cream, chicken, potatoes, peas. Pour into pie dish, top with crust. Cut vents. Bake at 400°F 35-40 minutes.

Cornbread.directions: Mix dry ingredients. Mix wet ingredients. Combine, don't overmix. Pour into buttered cast iron skillet. Bake at 425°F 20-25 minutes until golden and toothpick comes out clean. Brush with butter.

Cornbread with honey butter.directions: Make cornbread batter. Bake in cast iron at 425°F 20-25 minutes. Whip soft butter with honey. Serve hot cornbread with honey butter melting on top.

Hush puppies.directions: Mix cornmeal, flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, onion powder. Add beaten egg and buttermilk to form thick batter. Drop by spoonfuls into 350°F oil. Fry 3-4 minutes until golden brown, turning as needed.

Cheese bread.directions: Mix soft butter with minced garlic, parsley, parmesan. Spread on halved French bread. Top with shredded mozzarella. Bake at 375°F 15 minutes until cheese is bubbly and golden.

Garlic bread.directions: Mix soft butter with minced garlic, parsley, parmesan, salt. Halve bread lengthwise. Spread butter generously on cut sides. Wrap in foil. Bake at 375°F 15 minutes. Open foil, broil 2 minutes until golden.

Cheesy garlic bread.directions: Mix soft butter with minced garlic, parsley, parmesan. Halve bread, spread mixture on cut sides. Top with shredded mozzarella. Bake at 375°F 15 minutes until cheese bubbles.

Pizza.directions: Stretch dough on oiled sheet or stone. Spread thin layer of sauce. Top with shredded mozzarella. Drizzle olive oil, sprinkle Italian seasoning. Bake at 475°F 10-12 minutes until crust is golden and cheese bubbly.

Deep dish pizza.directions: Press dough into oiled deep dish pan, going up sides. Layer sliced mozzarella on bottom. Add cooked sausage. Top with seasoned crushed tomatoes. Sprinkle parmesan. Bake at 425°F 25-30 minutes until crust is golden and cheese bubbly.

Calzone.directions: Roll dough into circle. Spread ricotta on half. Add mozzarella and cooked sausage. Fold over, crimp edges. Brush with egg. Bake at 425°F 20-25 minutes until golden. Serve with marinara.

Stromboli.directions: Roll dough into rectangle. Layer meats and cheeses. Roll tightly, seal edges. Place seam down. Brush with egg wash. Bake at 400°F 20-25 minutes until golden. Brush with garlic butter. Slice. Serve with marinara.

Pizza rolls.directions: Roll dough into rectangle. Layer pepperoni and cheese. Roll tightly. Slice into 1-inch rounds. Place cut-side up in baking dish. Brush with garlic butter. Bake at 375°F 20-25 minutes until golden. Serve with marinara for dipping.

Focaccia.directions: Mix flour, yeast, salt, sugar. Add warm water and 2 tbsp olive oil. Knead until smooth. Rise 1 hour. Press into oiled sheet pan. Dimple with fingers. Drizzle generously with olive oil, sprinkle rosemary and flaky salt. Rise 30 minutes. Bake at 425°F 20-25 minutes.

Soft pretzels.directions: Make dough with flour, yeast, sugar, salt, butter, water. Rise 1 hour. Roll into ropes, shape into pretzels. Dip in baking soda water bath. Sprinkle with coarse salt. Bake at 450°F 12-15 minutes until golden.

Cheese sauce.directions: Make roux with butter and flour. Whisk in milk, simmer until thickened. Remove from heat. Add shredded cheddar, stir until melted. Season with salt, mustard, cayenne.

Beer cheese dip.directions: Melt cream cheese in saucepan. Add shredded cheddar gradually. Add beer, garlic, mustard, Worcestershire, hot sauce. Stir until smooth. Keep warm for serving with soft pretzels or bread.

Fondue.directions: Rub pot with garlic. Add wine, heat until simmering. Toss shredded cheeses with cornstarch. Add gradually, stirring constantly. Once melted and smooth, add lemon juice and kirsch. Serve immediately with cubed bread for dipping.

Welsh rarebit.directions: Melt butter, add cheese, stir until melted. Add beer, Worcestershire, mustard, cayenne. Stir until smooth. Toast bread. Pour cheese mixture over. Broil until bubbly. Optional: top with poached egg.

Cheese souffl\u00e9.directions: Make thick béchamel. Cool slightly. Beat in yolks, cheese, mustard, cayenne. Whip whites to stiff peaks. Fold in gently. Pour into buttered ramekins. Bake at 375°F 25-30 minutes until puffed and golden.

Popovers.directions: Heat popover pan in 450°F oven with butter in each cup. Blend eggs, milk, flour, salt until smooth. Pour into hot cups. Bake 20 minutes, reduce to 350°F, bake 15 more minutes. Don't open oven door. Serve immediately.

Yorkshire pudding.directions: Whisk 1 cup flour, 4 eggs, 1 cup milk, pinch salt until smooth. Rest 30 minutes. Heat muffin tin with drippings at 450°F until smoking. Pour batter into hot fat. Bake 20-25 minutes until puffed and golden. Don't open oven.

Toad in the hole.directions: Make Yorkshire pudding batter: whisk flour, eggs, milk, salt. Rest 30 minutes. Brown sausages, place in roasting tin with oil. Get oil very hot. Pour batter around sausages. Bake at 425°F 25-30 minutes until puffed and golden.

Scotch eggs.directions: Soft or hard boil eggs, peel. Wrap each in sausage layer. Dredge in flour, beaten egg, breadcrumbs. Deep fry at 350°F 6-8 minutes until sausage is cooked through. Let rest 2 minutes before cutting.

Deviled eggs.directions: Hard boil eggs 12 minutes. Cool in ice bath. Peel and halve. Remove yolks, mash with mayo, Dijon, salt, pepper. Pipe or spoon filling back into whites. Dust with paprika.

Hot and sour soup (simplified).directions: Shred pork, stir-fry. Add broth, soy sauce, bring to boil. Add cubed tofu. Add generous vinegar and white pepper. Thicken with cornstarch. Drizzle beaten eggs while stirring. Finish with sesame oil.

Wonton soup.directions: Mix pork with sesame oil, ginger, garlic, salt. Fill wonton wrappers, fold and seal. Simmer broth with soy sauce. Drop wontons in, cook 5-6 minutes until they float and are cooked through. Garnish with green onions.

Dumplings/potstickers.directions: Finely chop cabbage, salt, squeeze dry. Mix with pork, soy sauce, sesame oil, ginger, garlic. Fill wrappers, pleat edges. Pan-fry bottoms golden, add 1/3 cup water, cover, steam 5 minutes. Uncover to evaporate water and re-crisp bottoms.

Steamed pork buns.directions: Make dough with flour, yeast, sugar, warm water. Let rise. Season pork with soy, hoisin, sesame oil, ginger. Wrap filling in dough rounds, pleat closed. Steam for 15 minutes until fluffy.

Fried rice with everything.directions: Cook each protein separately. Scramble eggs. Stir-fry cold rice on high heat. Add soy sauce. Return all proteins and eggs. Add peas. Finish with sesame oil and green onions.

Congee/rice porridge.directions: Simmer rice in lots of broth with ginger 1-2 hours until porridge consistency. Season with soy sauce and sesame oil. Top with soft egg, green onions, crispy shallots.

Risotto.directions: Sauté shallots in butter. Add rice, toast 1 minute. Add wine, stir until absorbed. Add warm broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly until absorbed, about 20 minutes total. Finish with butter and parmesan.

Cheese risotto with sausage.directions: Brown crumbled sausage. Toast rice in butter with shallots. Add wine, stir until absorbed. Add warm broth ladle by ladle, stirring constantly. Finish with parmesan and sausage.

Arancini.directions: Make risotto with broth and parmesan. Cool. Form balls around cube of mozzarella. Dredge in flour, egg, breadcrumbs. Deep fry at 350°F until golden, 4-5 minutes.

Rice and gravy.directions: Brown beef, drain. Make roux with butter and flour. Add broth, simmer until gravy forms. Season with salt, pepper, onion powder. Add beef back. Serve over cooked rice.

Dirty rice.directions: Finely chop or process chicken livers. Brown beef and livers. Add garlic and Cajun seasoning. Add rice and broth. Cover, simmer 20 minutes until rice is tender. Stir in butter. Season.

Spanish rice.directions: Toast rice in oil until golden. Add garlic, cook 30 seconds. Add tomato sauce, broth, cumin, salt. Bring to boil. Cover, simmer 20 minutes until liquid absorbed. Fluff.

Rice pudding.directions: Cook rice in milk until soft. Add cream, sugar, vanilla, cook until creamy. Temper in beaten egg. Cook 2 more minutes, stirring. Serve warm or chilled, dusted with cinnamon.

Oatmeal.directions: Bring water and milk to boil with pinch of salt. Add oats, reduce heat. Cook stirring occasionally 5 minutes for quick oats, 10-20 for old-fashioned. Stir in butter. Top with brown sugar and cinnamon.

Baked oatmeal.directions: Mix oats, baking powder, cinnamon, salt. Mix milk, eggs, melted butter, brown sugar, vanilla. Combine wet and dry. Pour into greased baking dish. Bake at 350°F 40-45 minutes until set and golden.

Grits.directions: Bring 4 cups salted water and 1 cup milk to boil. Slowly whisk in 1 cup grits. Reduce heat, cook stirring frequently 20-25 minutes until thick and creamy. Stir in butter and cheese. Season with salt and pepper.

Shrimp and grits.directions: Cook grits in broth with cream until thick, stir in butter and cheese. Cook bacon until crispy, crumble. Sauté garlic in bacon fat, add shrimp, cook until pink. Season with salt and pepper. Serve shrimp over grits, top with bacon.

Polenta.directions: Bring broth to boil. Slowly whisk in polenta. Reduce heat, cook stirring frequently 30-40 minutes until creamy and thick. Stir in butter and parmesan. Season with salt and pepper.

Fried polenta.directions: Cook polenta with butter and parmesan until thick. Spread in sheet pan, refrigerate until firm. Cut into squares or triangles. Pan-fry in oil until golden and crispy on both sides. Season with salt.

Cream of wheat.directions: Bring milk and water to boil with salt. Slowly whisk in cream of wheat. Reduce heat, cook stirring 2-3 minutes. Stir in butter. Serve with brown sugar and cinnamon.

Cinnamon rolls.directions: Make enriched dough. Roll out, spread with butter, cinnamon, brown sugar. Roll tightly, slice. Rise in pan. Bake at 350°F 25-30 minutes. Top with cream cheese frosting.

Monkey bread.directions: Cut biscuits into quarters. Roll in cinnamon-sugar mixture. Layer in buttered bundt pan. Melt butter with brown sugar, pour over. Bake at 350°F 35-40 minutes until golden. Invert onto plate while warm.

Bread pudding.directions: Cube bread, dry out. Mix eggs, milk, cream, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon. Pour over bread with raisins. Let soak 30 minutes. Bake at 350°F 45-50 minutes until set. Serve with bourbon sauce.

Cheese danish.directions: Beat cream cheese with sugar, egg yolk, vanilla, lemon zest. Cut pastry into squares. Fold corners to center, add filling in center well. Brush with egg wash. Bake at 400°F 15-18 minutes.

Croissants.directions: Make détrempe dough. Fold in cold butter through multiple turns (lamination). Chill between folds. Shape into crescents. Rise 2 hours. Egg wash. Bake at 400°F 15-18 minutes until golden and flaky.

Beignets.directions: Warm milk, bloom yeast with 2 tbsp sugar. Add flour, eggs, melted butter, salt. Knead until smooth. Rise 2 hours. Roll 1/4 inch thick, cut squares. Fry at 360°F until puffed and golden. Bury under powdered sugar.

Donuts.directions: Warm milk, add yeast and sugar to bloom. Mix with flour, butter, eggs, salt. Knead until smooth. Rise 1 hour. Roll 1/2 inch thick, cut rings. Rise 30 minutes. Fry at 350°F 1-2 minutes per side. Glaze with powdered sugar mixed with milk.

Churros.directions: Boil water with butter and salt. Add flour, stir until ball forms. Cool slightly, beat in eggs. Pipe through star tip into 350°F oil. Fry until golden. Roll in cinnamon-sugar. Serve with chocolate sauce.

Sopapillas.directions: Mix flour, baking powder, salt, lard. Add water to form dough. Rest 30 minutes. Roll thin, cut into squares. Fry at 375°F until puffed and golden. Serve with honey or dust with cinnamon sugar.

Funnel cake.directions: Mix flour, baking powder, sugar, salt. Add eggs, milk, vanilla to form thin batter. Pour through funnel in circular motion into 375°F oil. Fry 2 minutes per side until golden. Dust heavily with powdered sugar.

Crepes.directions: Blend 1 cup flour, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup milk, 1/2 cup water, 2 tbsp melted butter, 1 tbsp sugar, pinch salt. Rest batter 30 minutes. Heat buttered pan over medium. Pour thin layer, swirl. Cook 1 minute, flip, cook 30 seconds. Fill as desired.

Blintzes.directions: Make thin crepes. Fill with sweetened ricotta-cream cheese mixture with vanilla and lemon zest. Fold envelope style. Pan-fry in butter until golden. Serve with sour cream and berries.

Dutch baby.directions: Preheat oven to 425°F with cast iron skillet inside. Blend 3 eggs, 1/2 cup flour, 1/2 cup milk, 1 tbsp sugar, vanilla, salt. Add 3 tbsp butter to hot skillet, swirl. Pour in batter. Bake 20-25 minutes until puffed and golden. Serve with lemon juice and powdered sugar.

Clafoutis.directions: Butter baking dish, arrange cherries. Blend eggs, sugar, flour, milk, vanilla until smooth. Pour over cherries. Bake at 350°F 40-45 minutes until puffed and golden. Dust with powdered sugar.

Flan.directions: Make caramel: melt 1 cup sugar until amber, pour into pan. Blend 5 eggs, condensed milk, evaporated milk, vanilla. Pour over caramel. Bake in water bath at 325°F 1 hour until set. Cool, refrigerate overnight. Invert to serve.

Cr\u00e8me br\u00fbl\u00e9e.directions: Heat cream with vanilla. Whisk yolks with 1/2 cup sugar. Temper in cream. Pour into ramekins. Bake in water bath at 325°F 40-45 minutes. Chill. Sprinkle sugar, torch until caramelized.

Panna cotta.directions: Bloom gelatin in cold milk. Heat cream with sugar until sugar dissolves. Add bloomed gelatin, stir until dissolved. Add vanilla. Pour into ramekins. Refrigerate 4+ hours until set. Unmold or serve in ramekin with berries.

Cheesecake.directions: Make crust, bake briefly. Beat cream cheese with sugar until smooth. Add eggs one at a time. Add sour cream and vanilla. Pour into crust. Bake at 325°F 55-65 minutes until center barely jiggles. Cool slowly.

No-bake cheesecake.directions: Beat cream cheese with powdered sugar and vanilla until smooth. Whip heavy cream to stiff peaks. Fold into cream cheese mixture with lemon juice. Spread in crust. Refrigerate 4+ hours until set.

Icebox cake.directions: Whip cream with sugar and vanilla to stiff peaks. Spread cream on cookies, stack into a log. Cover with remaining cream. Refrigerate overnight. Slice on diagonal to serve.

Tres leches cake.directions: Make sponge cake with eggs, sugar, flour, baking powder, vanilla. Bake at 350°F 25-30 minutes. Mix three milks. Poke holes in warm cake, slowly pour milk mixture over. Refrigerate overnight. Top with whipped cream.

Pound cake.directions: Cream 1 lb butter with 2 cups sugar. Add 4 eggs one at a time. Mix in 3 cups flour, vanilla, salt. Pour into greased loaf pan. Bake at 325°F 60-75 minutes until toothpick comes out clean. Cool in pan.

Butter cake.directions: Cream 1 cup butter with 2 cups sugar. Add 4 eggs one at a time. Mix flour, baking powder, salt. Alternate adding dry ingredients and milk. Add vanilla. Bake at 350°F 30-35 minutes.

Snickerdoodles.directions: Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs. Mix in flour, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt. Roll into balls. Roll in cinnamon-sugar mixture. Bake at 375°F 10-12 minutes until edges set but centers soft.

Sugar cookies.directions: Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix in flour, baking powder, salt. Chill 1 hour. Roll out, cut shapes. Bake at 350°F 8-10 minutes until edges barely golden. Cool before frosting if desired.

Peanut butter cookies.directions: Cream peanut butter with sugars. Add egg, vanilla, baking soda, and salt. Roll into balls, flatten with fork in crosshatch pattern. Bake at 350°F for 10-12 minutes.

Shortbread.directions: Cream 1 cup butter with 1/2 cup sugar. Add vanilla, salt, 2 cups flour. Press into pan. Prick with fork. Chill 30 minutes. Bake at 325°F 25-30 minutes until pale golden. Cut while warm.

Chocolate chip cookies.directions: Cream butter with sugars. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix flour, baking soda, salt. Combine. Fold in chocolate chips. Drop onto sheets. Bake at 375°F 9-11 minutes until edges golden.

Brownies.directions: Melt butter with sugar and cocoa. Cool slightly. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Fold in flour and salt. Add chocolate chips. Pour into 9x9 pan. Bake at 350°F 25-30 minutes. Cool before cutting.

Egg foo young.directions: Make gravy: simmer broth with soy sauce, oyster sauce. Thicken with cornstarch slurry. Beat eggs with salt. Add chopped cooked shrimp and bean sprouts. Fry small omelets in oil until golden both sides. Serve with gravy.

Fried rice cakes.directions: Slice rice cakes if in log form. Fry in oil until crispy outside but chewy inside. Add scrambled eggs, scallions, soy sauce. Finish with sesame oil.

Bibimbap (no veg).directions: Cook rice. Marinate sliced beef in soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic. Cook beef until caramelized. Fry egg sunny-side up. Assemble: rice in hot stone bowl, top with beef, fried egg, gochujang. Drizzle sesame oil, sprinkle sesame seeds. Mix before eating.

Gyudon.directions: Slice beef very thin. Simmer soy sauce, mirin, sake, sugar, dashi. Add beef and sliced ginger, cook 5 minutes. Beat egg lightly, pour over beef, cover and cook until just set. Serve over hot rice.

Katsudon.directions: Make tonkatsu: bread and fry cutlet. Slice into strips. Simmer soy sauce, mirin, dashi, sugar. Add cutlet. Beat eggs lightly, pour around cutlet. Cover, cook until eggs just set. Slide over hot rice in bowl.

Oyakodon.directions: Simmer soy sauce, mirin, dashi, sugar. Add sliced chicken, cook 5 minutes. Beat eggs lightly, pour around chicken. Cover, cook until eggs just set. Slide over hot rice. Garnish with green onions.

Tonkatsu.directions: Pound cutlets thin. Season with salt and pepper. Dredge in flour, beaten egg, panko. Deep fry at 350°F 5-6 minutes until deep golden. Rest, slice. Serve with shredded cabbage and tonkatsu sauce.

Chicken katsu.directions: Pound chicken thin and even. Season with salt and pepper. Dredge in flour, egg, then panko. Deep fry at 350°F for 6-7 minutes until golden and cooked through (165°F). Rest 2 minutes, slice, serve with tonkatsu sauce.

Japanese curry.directions: Cut beef into cubes, brown in oil. Add cubed potatoes and water. Simmer 20 minutes until potatoes are tender. Break curry roux blocks into pot, stir until dissolved and thickened. Serve over rice.

Teriyaki chicken.directions: Make teriyaki sauce: simmer soy sauce, mirin, sake, and sugar until slightly thickened. Score chicken thighs, marinate in sauce 1-4 hours. Grill or pan-fry chicken, basting with sauce, until charred and cooked through. Garnish with sesame seeds.

Teriyaki beef.directions: Slice beef thin. Make teriyaki: simmer soy sauce, mirin, sake, sugar until slightly thickened. Stir-fry beef quickly over high heat. Add teriyaki sauce. Serve over rice with sesame seeds.

Yakitori.directions: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Make tare: simmer soy sauce, mirin, sake, sugar until slightly thickened. Thread chicken on skewers. Grill, brushing with tare frequently, until charred and cooked through. Garnish with sesame seeds.

Negima... skip the negi.directions: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Thread onto skewers. Make tare sauce by simmering soy sauce, mirin, sake, and sugar until slightly thickened. Grill skewers, basting with tare.

Tsukune.directions: Mix ground chicken with panko, ginger, salt. Form into oval meatballs on skewers. Grill, basting with tare made from soy, mirin, sake, sugar. Serve with raw egg yolk for dipping.

Gyoza.directions: Finely chop cabbage, salt and squeeze dry. Mix with pork, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, sesame oil. Fill wrappers, pleat and seal. Pan-fry bottom until golden, add water, cover to steam 5 minutes. Remove lid to evaporate water and crisp. Serve with soy-vinegar dipping sauce.

Ramen (simplified).directions: Simmer broth with soy sauce and miso. Slice pork belly, sear until crispy. Soft-boil eggs 6.5 minutes. Cook noodles. Assemble: noodles in bowl, ladle broth, top with pork, halved egg, nori, green onions.

Shoyu ramen.directions: Simmer pork belly until tender, slice. Make broth by combining chicken stock, dashi, soy sauce, and mirin. Cook noodles. Assemble with broth, noodles, pork, halved egg, nori, and scallions.

Miso ramen.directions: Simmer broth with garlic and ginger. Soft-boil eggs 6.5 minutes, marinate in soy sauce. Sear sliced pork belly until crispy. Cook noodles. Whisk miso into broth (don't boil after). Assemble: noodles, broth, pork, halved egg, nori, green onions.

Tonkotsu ramen.directions: Boil pork bones vigorously 8-12 hours until broth is milky white. Season with soy sauce. Slice braised pork belly. Soft-boil eggs 6.5 minutes, marinate in soy. Cook noodles. Assemble: noodles, broth, pork, egg, nori, green onions.

Chashu pork.directions: Roll and tie pork belly. Sear. Braise in soy sauce, mirin, sake, sugar, ginger, garlic 2-3 hours until tender. Cool in liquid. Slice thin. Torch to caramelize for ramen topping.

Pork belly buns.directions: Slow braise pork belly with soy sauce, sugar, five spice for 3 hours until tender. Slice thick. Steam buns. Spread hoisin in bun. Add pork belly slice, cucumber, green onion.

Char siu.directions: Cut pork into long strips. Marinate in hoisin, honey, soy sauce, five spice, garlic, rice wine overnight. Roast at 425°F, basting with marinade, until caramelized. Rest and slice.

Char siu rice.directions: Slice char siu pork. Steam rice. Blanch bok choy. Arrange sliced pork over rice. Drizzle with sauce from pork. Top with fried egg and bok choy. Simple and perfect.

Lo mein.directions: Cook noodles. Slice pork thin, stir-fry until cooked. Add garlic and ginger. Add shredded cabbage, stir-fry 2 minutes. Add noodles, soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil. Toss everything together over high heat.

Chow mein.directions: Boil noodles, drain well, dry slightly. Slice chicken thin, stir-fry until cooked. Add garlic and ginger. Add cabbage, stir-fry 2 minutes. Push aside, add noodles in single layer to crisp. Add sauces, toss everything together.

Chow fun.directions: Soak noodles in hot water. Stir-fry sliced beef, remove. Add noodles to very hot wok, don't stir, let char. Add sauces. Return beef. Add bean sprouts last minute.

Beef chow fun.directions: Slice beef thin. Stir-fry in hot wok until just done, remove. Add noodles, char without stirring. Add soy sauces, oyster sauce. Return beef. Add bean sprouts last minute. Toss.

Pad see ew.directions: Soak noodles in hot water until pliable. Stir-fry beef, remove. Scramble eggs, remove. Add noodles, soy sauces, oyster sauce. Char noodles without stirring. Add beef, eggs, broccoli. Toss.

Pad thai (simplified).directions: Soak rice noodles in hot water. Make sauce: tamarind, fish sauce, sugar. Stir-fry shrimp, remove. Scramble eggs, remove. Stir-fry noodles with sauce. Add shrimp and eggs back. Serve with peanuts and lime.

Drunken noodles.directions: Soak noodles in hot water until pliable. Slice chicken, stir-fry until cooked. Add garlic and chilies. Push aside, scramble eggs. Add noodles, soy sauce, oyster sauce, fish sauce. Toss. Add Thai basil, toss until wilted.

Tom yum soup (no veg).directions: Simmer broth with lemongrass, galangal, and lime leaves. Add chili paste and fish sauce. Add shrimp, cook until pink. Finish with coconut milk and lime juice.

Thai basil chicken.directions: Mince chicken. Stir-fry garlic and chilies. Add chicken, cook until browned. Add fish sauce, soy sauce, oyster sauce, sugar. Cook 2 minutes. Add Thai basil, stir until wilted. Serve over rice with fried egg.

Larb.directions: Toast rice, grind to powder. Cook pork, break up finely. Off heat, add lime juice, fish sauce, toasted rice powder, sliced chilies, minced shallots, torn mint. Serve with sticky rice and cabbage leaves.

Satay.directions: Marinate chicken in coconut milk, turmeric, coriander, cumin, garlic, lemongrass. Thread onto skewers, grill. Make peanut sauce with peanut butter, coconut milk, soy sauce, lime. Serve with sauce.

Peanut noodles.directions: Cook noodles, rinse cold. Whisk peanut butter, soy sauce, vinegar, sesame oil, honey, garlic, ginger, lime juice until smooth. Toss with noodles. Top with crushed peanuts.

Sesame noodles.directions: Cook noodles, rinse cold. Whisk sesame paste, soy sauce, vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, garlic, ginger until smooth. Toss with noodles. Top with sesame seeds.

Dan dan noodles.directions: Cook noodles. Toast and grind Sichuan peppercorns. Make sauce: mix sesame paste, soy sauce, chili oil, vinegar, sugar. Stir-fry pork with garlic until crispy. Place noodles in bowls, add sauce, top with pork, Sichuan pepper, green onions.

Zhajiangmian.directions: Brown pork. Add sweet bean paste, soy sauce, rice wine, sugar. Simmer until thick. Cook noodles. Top with meat sauce and julienned cucumber.
